data.text: characteristic of only one person, group, or thing: distinctive
examples: … a drowsy fervour of manner and tone which was quite peculiar to her.
It seems peculiar that she would leave town without telling anybody.
The play had a zany plot and very peculiar characters.

data.text: different from the usual or normal:
examples: … a drowsy fervour of manner and tone which was quite peculiar to her.
It seems peculiar that she would leave town without telling anybody.
The play had a zany plot and very peculiar characters.
… a drowsy fervour of manner and tone which was quite peculiar to her.

data.text: something exempt from ordinary jurisdiction; especially: a church or parish exempt from the jurisdiction of the ordinary in whose territory it lies
